name: Sweet Dreams Holographic Ticket
description: Upon use, one of the following effects will be randomly applied to all allies in the next battle: Mirror Princess Edition — DEF increases by 36%. Miss Note Edition — Max HP increases by 30%.
story:
A limited-edition version of Dreamville-themed souvenirs, offered exclusively in Clock Studios Theme Park. This series is currently available in two editions: Miss Note and Mirror Princess.

"Hooray! Mutant heads!"
"Your taste is so weird..."
